text: @senatemajldr Unlike your liability waiver for businesses that reopen, bring back employees who are then infected with COVID19. Since you are sooo concerned about tax cuts for the rich... Now let’s talk about wish list items, $685B for military spending, $1.7B for a new FBI building.
